title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / love did him in

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "As you look back you think: So love..."
dialogueTree.text: As you look back you think: So love did *do him in* after all.

links.title: You: "I was right..."
links.text: I was right...

links.title: Inland Empire: "If it weren't for her he would not..."
links.text: If it weren't for her he would not have been there. The shot would not have connected with his soft palate...

links.title: You: "I already miss Klaasje."
links.text: I already miss Klaasje.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Of course you do, Harry. Everyone d..."
links.text: Of course you do, Harry. Everyone does.

links.title: Drama: "Gone forever... Sire, thee shall ne..."
links.text: Gone forever... Sire, thee shall never findeth another mistress quaint like her!

links.title: Half Light: "You fool! What are you waiting for?..."
links.text: You fool! What are you waiting for?! Mount a rescue operation and go get her back!

links.title: You: "I did the right thing. I know I did..."
links.text: I did the right thing. I know I did.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Feels good, doesn't it? Doing the r..."
links.text: Feels good, doesn't it? Doing the right thing.

links.title: Authority: "Hey, what is this funeral vibe here..."
links.text: Hey, what is this funeral vibe here? You did what any good cop would do. Pat yourself on the back and move on.

links.title: Volition: "You were just being a good cop."
links.text: You were just being a good cop.

links.title: You: "It *killed* him... (Look at Klaasje..."
links.text: It *killed* him... (Look at Klaasje.)

links.title: Inland Empire: "No. Communism killed him, remember?..."
links.text: No. Communism killed him, remember? Love made it possible. You know this much.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Or was it communism that killed him..."
links.text: Or was it communism that killed him and love that did him in...

links.title: You: "(Turn to Klaasje.) "Looks like love..."
links.text: (Turn to Klaasje.) "Looks like love did him in after all."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She's silent, holding on to her cof..."
links.text: She's silent, holding on to her coffee mug. No vapour rises from it -- it's cold.

links.title: Volition: "It appears this one has *not* been..."
links.text: It appears this one has *not* been entirely corrupted... this may help. This may help the others see.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Remember this silence. The lady is..."
links.text: Remember this silence. The lady is dangerous. People suffer around her.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Let her answer."
links.text: Say nothing. Let her answer.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah..." she finally breaks the si..."
links.text: "Yeah..." she finally breaks the silence. "I'd like to think he didn't *love* me. Or that it was chemically-induced and not real."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Easier that way." She takes a sip."
links.text: "Easier that way." She takes a sip.

links.title: You: ""Was it? Real?""
links.text: "Was it? Real?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know..." She looks down at..."
links.text: "I don't know..." She looks down at the yard -- then back into her coffee.

links.title: Composure: "There's a nod, the smallest of nods..."
links.text: There's a nod, the smallest of nods.

links.title: Empathy: "Real as anything."
links.text: Real as anything.

links.title: You: "What is communism in this?"
links.text: What is communism in this?

links.title: Inland Empire: "You do not know. A wind of needles...."
links.text: You do not know. A wind of needles. Airships flutter in the stratosphere.

links.title: You: "How do I... know all this then?"
links.text: How do I... know all this then?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who knows?... It's getting cold out..."
links.text: Who knows?... It's getting cold out. You should go.

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.text: [Finish thought.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "If it weren't for her he would not..."
links.text: If it weren't for her he would not have been there. The shot would not have connected with his soft palate...

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
